languages.text: Вольный Торговец использовал{mf||а} варп-вокс, чтобы подслушивать козни еретиков, однако эта прослушка стоит жизней многочисленных операторов.
The Rogue Trader decided to use the warp vox to listen in on the heretics' plans, but this process costs many operators their lives.
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец использовал{mf||а} варп-вокс, чтобы подслушивать козни еретиков, однако эта прослушка стоит жизней многочисленных операторов.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader decided to use the warp vox to listen in on heretics' plans, but this process costs many operators their lives.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a décidé d'utiliser le vox du Warp pour découvrir les plans des hérétiques, mais ce procédé coûte la vie à beaucoup d'opérateurs.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader decided to use the warp vox to listen in on the heretics' plans, but this process costs many operators their lives.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a décidé d'utiliser le vox du Warp pour découvrir les plans des hérétiques, mais ce procédé coûte la vie à beaucoup d'opérateurs.

languages.text: 自由開拓者は異端者たちの計画を盗聴するためにワープ・ヴォックスを使うことにしたが、この過程で多くのオペレーターたちが命を落とした。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader decided to use the warp vox to listen in on the heretics' plans, but this process costs many operators their lives.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者は異端者たちの計画を盗聴するためにワープ・ヴォックスを使うことにしたが、この過程で多くのオペレーターたちが命を落とした。

languages.text: 行商浪人决定利用亚空间音阵来监听异端分子的阴谋，但许多操作员在这个过程中牺牲了性命。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader decided to use the warp vox to listen in on the heretics' plans, but this process costs many operators their lives.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人决定利用亚空间音阵来监听异端分子的阴谋，但许多操作员在这个过程中牺牲了性命。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente decidió utilizar el voco de la disformidad para escuchar los planes de los herejes, pero este proceso se lleva la vida de muchos operadores.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader decided to use the warp vox to listen in on the heretics' plans, but this process costs many operators their lives.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente decidió utilizar el voco de la disformidad para escuchar los planes de los herejes, pero este proceso se lleva la vida de muchos operadores.

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat entschieden, das Warpvox einzusetzen, um die Pläne der Ketzer zu belauschen. Dieser Prozess hat jedoch viele Mitglieder des Vox-Personals das Leben gekostet.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader decided to use the warp vox to listen in on the heretics' plans, but this process costs many operators their lives.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat entschieden, das Warpvox einzusetzen, um die Pläne der Ketzer zu belauschen. Dieser Prozess hat jedoch viele Mitglieder des Vox-Personals das Leben gekostet.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, kâfirlerin planlarını dinlemek için öteboyut voksu kullanmaya karar verdi ancak bu işlem birçok operatörün hayatına mal oldu.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader decided to use the warp vox to listen in on the heretics' plans, but this process costs many operators their lives.
